description:
Non-material minor amendment of planning permission ref P091052 dated 2 June 2010.for the  The non-material minor amendments are:
a) Removal of some windows to rear extension
b) Re-positioning and re-sizing of some windows
c) Alterations to windows in roof extension
d) extension of basement
e) changes to internal layout
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Energy Statement; Toolkit Viability Update; Planning Statement; Sustainability Statement; Daylight and Sunlight Assessment; Transport Statement; Heritage Assessment; Design and Access Statement; Site Plan; E01; E02; E03; E04; E05; Document entitled ‘Lifetime Homes – Schedule of Accommodation – for compliance with London Plan policy 3A.5 Housing Choice’; Document entitled ‘Islington Flexible Homes – Schedule of Accommodation – for compliance with Islington’s UDP Plan policy 4B.5: Creating an inclusive environment’; ESM – 100 Revision B, ESM – 101 Revision D, ESM – 102 Revision B, ESM – 103 Revision A, ESM – SK1 – 290910, ESM – PC002 Revision B, ESM – SK1510, SKESM – 512 Revision B

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
